body: So what I don't get is why she's still working as a sex worker, even after getting into a rls with that girl? Like, that is just absurd
The guy below me is right, just letting you guys know yuri is not all lewd shiz. Yuri is a based on girls love, if it was just girls doing lewd things id have less interest.
Yep, this is some pretty mediocre yuri, although, don’t let all the negative comments dissuade you from reading this one. It’s definitely not as bad as everyone is making it out to be.

poster.username: Forgive me for I have sinned

body: Anthologies always give me mixed feelings, some good stories might get serialized and fleshed out wonderfully, though some are just one-shots which have so much wasted potential it’s actually frustrating.

This is so bad and I don't mean the art. You either focus on the story or the sex scenes or both but this one might have a good premise but there is no focus on the story. It just feels super rushed and it's really hard to grasp the passage of time.
But then there are barely any sex scenes which makes this lacking in everything but artstyle.
It's really frustrating since this could have been good both ways.
The art was good so there was potential for good sex scenes and the premise could have lead to good story.
Nice story, wish we can get more sex scenes

I'm normally one who loves story in yuri doujins, and it's still really cute here, so that's great. Definitely could work on the actual sex content itself, though. Not bad, very wholesome, but if you're looking to fap, this ain't it chief.
Why do most of the lesbian doujin only have like 2 or 3 pages of lewd, and most is offscreen?

Nice. This doujin has a pretty good story but unfortunately that’s about all it has going for it. The sex scenes are way too short and boring. The is nice but unfortunately it does not make up for the boring action. 4/10 for me.
Glad we're getting lots of females only doujins, unfortunate that  a bunch are about prostitution lol
